meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the normal functions of living organisms and their parts.
meanings.sent1: Studying physiology helps us understand how our bodies work.
meanings.sent2: Doctors need to have a good grasp of physiology to treat patients effectively.
meanings.sent3: The physiology of a cat can be quite different from that of a dog.
meanings.sent4: The physiology of a well-oiled machine is crucial for its smooth operation.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the physiology of plants can be fascinating and informative.

meanings.definition: The way in which a living organism or bodily part functions.
meanings.sent1: The physiology of the heart involves pumping blood throughout the body.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the physiology of muscles is important for athletes.
meanings.sent3: The physiology of a clown involves making people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The physiology of a clock is like the heartbeat of a room.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the physiology of the brain can lead to amazing discoveries.
